Providing Comprehensive Healthcare Services in Downtown Chicago

At Chicago Premier Medical Associates, we are committed to providing exceptional medical care with a personal touch. Our experienced team of physicians offers a full range of services to meet your healthcare needs.

Our Experienced Medical Team

Dr. Sarah Johnson, MD

Specialty: Internal Medicine

Education: Northwestern University Feinberg School of Medicine

Board Certifications: American Board of Internal Medicine

Experience: 15+ years in Internal Medicine

Direct Email: dr.johnson@chicagopremiermedicine.com

Languages: English, Spanish

Dr. Johnson specializes in preventive care, chronic disease management, and comprehensive health assessments.

Dr. Smith provides comprehensive family healthcare for patients of all ages, from pediatrics to geriatrics.

Location & Accessibility

Our office is conveniently located in the heart of Chicago's Loop district, easily accessible by public transportation.

Parking: Validated parking available in the building garage

Public Transit: 2 blocks from Union Station, multiple CTA bus lines

Accessibility: Full wheelchair accessibility, elevator access to all floors
